mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_odo_archiv${sysDate} ( id, odo_code , ext_code , ec_order_code , customer_id , store_id , odo_type , group_odo_code , original_odo_code , priority_level , #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{odoCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{extCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{skuNumberOfPackages,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{amt,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{distributeMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{epistaticSystemsOrderType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{outboundCartonType,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{assignFailReason,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isAllowMerge,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{isLocked,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{waveCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{counterCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{distributionCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSource,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extOdoType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFreightInvoiceSunder,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{headStartOdoStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lagOdoStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPermitOutBound,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT}, #{odoIndex,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.delete: delete from t_wh_odo where id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_line where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_transport_service where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_line_sn where odo_line_id in (select id from t_wh_odo_line where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}) and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_attr where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_line_attr where odo_line_id in (select id from t_wh_odo_line where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}) and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_invoice where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_invoice_line where odo_invoice_id in (select id from t_wh_odo_invoice where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}) and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_address where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_vas where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_transport_mgmt where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_outboundbox where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_outboundbox_line where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_outboundbox_line_sn where wh_outboundbox_line_id in (select id from t_wh_outboundbox_line where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}) and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_delivery_info where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
delete from t_wh_odo_outboundbox where odo_id = #{odoid} and ou_id = #{ouid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_odo_archiv_index ( ec_order_code , wms_odo_code , is_returned_purchase , ou_id , sys_date , data_source ) VALUES ( #{ecOrderCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{wmsOdoCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isReturnedPurchase,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{sysDate,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{dataSource,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO t_wh_outboundbox_archiv${sysDate} ( id, batch , wave_code , customer_code , customer_name , store_code , store_name , transport_code , transport_name , product_code , product_name , time_effect_code , time_effect_name , status , ou_id , odo_id , outboundbox_id , outboundbox_code , distribution_mode , picking_mode , checking_mode ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{batch,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{waveCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{customerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{customerName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{storeName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{transportCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{transportName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{productCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{productName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{timeEffectCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{timeEffectName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{status,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{odoId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outboundboxId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outboundboxCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{distributionMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{pickingMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{checkingMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO t_wh_outboundbox_line_archiv${sysDate} ( id, wh_outboundbox_id , sku_code , sku_ext_code , sku_bar_code , sku_name , qty , customer_code , customer_name , store_code , store_name , inv_status , inv_type , batch_number , mfg_date , exp_date , country_of_origin , inv_attr1 , inv_attr2 , inv_attr3 , inv_attr4 , inv_attr5 , uuid , ou_id , odo_id , odo_line_id ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{whOutboundboxId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{skuCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{skuExtCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{skuBarCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{skuName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{qty,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{customerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{customerName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{storeName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{batchNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mfgDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{expDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{countryOfOrigin,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr1,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr2,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr3,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr4,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr5,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{uuid,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{odoId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{odoLineId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.select: select box.id as whOutboundboxLineId, line.sku_id as skuId, line.store_id as storeId, box.qty as returnedPurchaseQty, box.mfg_date as mfgDate, box.exp_date as expDate, box.batch_number as batchNumber, box.country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, box.inv_status as invStatus, box.inv_type as invType, box.inv_attr1 as invAttr1, box.inv_attr2 as invAttr2, box.inv_attr3 as invAttr3, box.inv_attr4 as invAttr4, box.inv_attr5 as invAttr5, line.color as color, line.style as style, line.size as size, box.ou_id as ouId, box.uuid as uuid from t_wh_outboundbox_line_archiv${sysDate} box left join t_wh_odo_line_archiv${sysDate} line on box.odo_line_id = line.id where box.odo_id = #{odoId} and box.ou_id = #{ouId}

select sn.id as id, sn.wh_outboundbox_line_id as whOutboundboxLineId, sn.sn as sn, sn.status as status, sn.inv_attr as invAttr, sn.uuid as uuid, sn.ou_id as ouId, sn.sys_uuid as sysUuid from t_wh_outboundbox_line_sn_archiv${sysDate} sn where sn.wh_outboundbox_line_id = #{boxLineId} and sn.sn is not null and sn.ou_id = #{ouId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_odo_archiv_line_index_${num} ( ec_order_code , data_source , sku_id , store_id , returned_purchase_qty , mfg_date , exp_date , batch_number , country_of_origin , inv_status , inv_type , inv_attr1 , inv_attr2 , inv_attr3 , inv_attr4 , inv_attr5 , color , style , size , sn , uuid ) VALUES ( #{ecOrderCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{dataSource,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{skuId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{storeId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{returnedPurchaseQty,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{mfgDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{expDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{batchNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{countryOfOrigin,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invStatus,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{invType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr1,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr2,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr3,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr4,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr5,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{color,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{style,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{size,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{sn,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{uuid,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO t_wh_odo_delivery_info_archiv${sysDate} ( id, odo_id , transport_code , waybill_code , transport_service_type , time_effect_type , delivery_info_id , outboundbox_id , outboundbox_code , status , ou_id , lifecycle , create_id , create_time , last_modify_time , modified_id ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{odoId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{transportCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{waybillCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{transportServiceType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{timeEffectType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{deliveryInfoId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outboundboxId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outboundboxCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{status,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{createId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.select: select id as id, odo_code as odoCode, ext_code as extCode, ec_order_code as ecOrderCode, customer_id as customerId, store_id as storeId, odo_type as odoType, group_odo_code as groupOdoCode, original_odo_code as originalOdoCode, priority_level as priorityLevel, is_whole_order_outbound as isWholeOrderOutbound, cross_docking_symbol as crossDockingSymbol, order_type as orderType, order_time as orderTime, odo_status as odoStatus, qty as qty, current_qty as currentQty, actual_qty as actualQty, cancel_qty as cancelQty, sku_number_of_packages as skuNumberOfPackages, amt as amt, distribute_mode as distributeMode, epistatic_systems_order_type as epistaticSystemsOrderType, outbound_carton_type as outboundCartonType, include_hazardous_cargo as includeHazardousCargo, include_fragile_cargo as includeFragileCargo, is_assign_success as isAssignSuccess, assign_fail_reason as assignFailReason, is_allow_merge as isAllowMerge, is_locked as isLocked, ou_id as ouId, create_time as createTime, created_id as createdId, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, modified_id as modifiedId, wave_code as waveCode, counter_code as counterCode, distribution_code as distributionCode, ext_odo_type as extOdoType from t_wh_odo_archiv${sysDate} where odo_code = #{odoCode} and ou_id = #{ouId}
